source.oobs_installAsk_description1: You can either install LiveG OS to this device's internal storage now, or try out LiveG OS without installation first.
source.oobs_installAsk_description2: If you choose to try out LiveG OS without installing, files you save and changes you make in LiveG OS will be lost when the system shuts down.
source.oobs_installAsk_install_title: Install LiveG OS to internal storage
source.oobs_installAsk_install_description: You will be able to choose the disk and partition to install to
source.oobs_installAsk_tryOut_title: Try out LiveG OS without installation
source.oobs_installAsk_tryOut_description: Changes will be lost and internal storage will not be affected
source.oobs_installDisk_title: Choose a disk to install to
source.oobs_installDisk_description: Before LiveG OS is installed, you will be able to configure the partitions of the disk to install to.
source.oobs_installDisk_emptyError: Please select a disk to install LiveG OS onto.
source.oobs_installDisks_noneMessage_descriptio: Shut down the system, then check whether the disks are connected.
source.oobs_installPartition_description: Partitions are areas of the disk that can be reserved for different purposes (such as for installing multiple operating systems). Choose how you wish to partition the disk for when LiveG OS is installed.
source.oobs_installPartition_erase_title: Erase entire disk and install LiveG OS
source.oobs_installPartition_erase_description: All data stored on the chosen disk will be lost. The recommended partitions for installing LiveG OS will be automatically created.
source.oobs_installPartition_existing_title: Install LiveG OS to an existing partition
source.oobs_installPartition_existing_partition: Partition to erase and install onto
source.oobs_installPartition_new_title: Create a new partition to install LiveG OS onto
source.oobs_installPartition_noneExistNotice: (None exist that are compatible with LiveG OS)
source.oobs_installPartition_minimumSizeError: The size of the partition to create cannot be zero.
source.oobs_installPartition_notEnoughSpaceErro: There is not enough free space to install LiveG OS with this configuration. A minimum free space of {sizeMetric} ({sizeIec}) is required to install LiveG OS.
source.oobs_installConfirm_description1: Now is the best time to review the choices you have made on the previous steps before installation starts.
source.oobs_installConfirm_description2: You will not be able to revert your device's configuration or recover any erased data unless you have previously made a backup of your device's internal storage.
source.oobs_installConfirm_description3: You will also not be able to return back to the previous steps while LiveG OS is being installed.
source.oobs_installProcess_warning: This might take a while. Please do not power off this device.
source.oobs_installFinish_description: LiveG OS has now been installed. The system will restart in 10 seconds so that you can continue with setting up LiveG OS.
source.oobs_installFail_description: An error occurred which caused the installation of LiveG OS to be aborted. You may want to review the options you chose and try again.
source.oobs_userProfile_title: Let's get some details about you
source.oobs_userProfile_displayNameHint: We recommend that you enter your full name, but any name (such as a nickname or username) is fine.
source.oobs_userProfile_displayNameLengthError: The name you entered is too long; please shorten it.
source.oobs_finish_description1: That's all we need from you to set up your device. When you're ready, you can start using your device right away.
source.oobs_finish_description2: Now is the best time to review the choices you have made on the previous steps before your device's configuration is finalised. You can always change the options you've chosen later in the Settings app.
